text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump FFS, Kayleigh, you're a Trumpist; learn your job! The trick to lying is to make your lies SOMEWHAT believable. This one is laughably stupid. And dangerous. But that's the brand of the Trump administration, isn't it? Stupid, dishonest, and dangerous. https://t.co/uckCW8bMC5
